title: Mordekaiser needs no buffs
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/153a31bf2fb6d86f890da710463f5f5b.png

as a Mordekaiser main i'm concerned about one thing

Mordekaiser needs no buffs
however if you decide to buff marksmen's base stats with rune reforged then i think a buff to his base stats is needed indeed

I think marskmen will have their base ad buffed and maybe their base armor/attack speed
and if it's done, then you need to give mordekaiser 20 starting AP as this is what the 8 botlane mordekaiser mains do in d1+ on EUW

Meddler talked one time about giving AP champions a base ap and maybe AP/lvl, i for sure hope that morde is in those champions because right now the most viable build on him is full ap + full ap on runes and if you don't give him ap then at least give him some hp/lvl in compensation of the one he lost through runes

thank you

I don't think giving starting AP is good. Giving AP to specific champions restricts other champions that might have wanted to go AP.

Like for example I'm playing Karma support and I don't get AP but Mordekaiser gets AP. It's kinda lame. Or maybe I'm playing some hybrid champions and I want some extra AP early, kinda lame.

I do think he should have base stat increased but no champion should get free AP just cause. Getting stats from the new rune system is fine because you make a choice their and are choosing specific power out of a bunch of power you could get.

Yeah I know. His best builds focus on AP though. In comparison to other hybrids who spec into more A/S and on-hit items. For that reason I consider him AP, although he has pretty good AD scalings.

mordekaiser needs buffs because hes toxic. he needs a rework.

hes toxic to play as  when enemy has ranged damage and cc. hes toxic to play against if your laning against him and you're melee
I see no champion getting that much AP level one when runes get adjusted.  Maybe 10 at max or a growth AP of 5ish per level.
